original_text: And I scattered them among the heathen, and they were dispersed through the countries: according to their way and according to their doings I judged them.
korean_text: 그들을 그 행위대로 심판하여 각국에 흩으며 여러 나라에 헤쳤더니

sentences.original_text: And I scattered them among the heathen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그들을 이방인 중에 흩었다

sentences.original_text: and they were dispersed through the countries
